data.name: O.A.C - World Begins
data.detailed_description:
UPA TOKENS



UPA Token is a crypto token that you will receive as a result of your actions in the O.A.C.

HOW TO EARN?
Tokens are earned only as a result of transactions made within the O.A.C. With the participation of the player, he can withdraw the participation tokens directly to his wallet account from the bank account he opened in the O.A.C World.


SECRET PROFESSIONS


There are three secret missions in OAC World Begins apart from the main mission. Players are included in the profession they choose from three occupational groups.

  • Explorers / Traders,
  • Hunter / Guardians,
  • Assassin / Thieves

Traders are tasked with collecting and trading valuable materials found in the OAC World.
In return, UPA Token is earned.

Hunter/Guardians are tasked with protecting merchants and their goods.

Assassin / Thieves are tasked with stealing assets acquired by traders.

The unique assets found are worth NFT. But OAC unique entities are defined as CCA (closed circuit assets) CCA's are global blockchain independent and O.A.C exclusive. Players are free to sell, trade, or store the unique assets they have acquired in a closed-loop system forever.

O.A.C will not sell you an NFT. But you can find them in the world.

Please wait for us for more details!


About the Game



First seize the power in your own country!

O.A.C is working hard to inspire their genre and make it even better in the grand strategy game category.

Each country has its own internal dynamic, political structure, socio-economical order, and culture. Religions, ethnic groups, professions, NGOs, country problems, epidemics, natural disasters, economies and many more characteristics are determined within each country. Amid all this, create your own strategy to seize power in your country as a seemingly ordinary person.

The Great War - AFTER THE OLD GOVERNMENT

If you win the power struggle, you are at the start of your O.A.C journey. Changing technologies in all countries of the world brought along the nano-technological war. While the countries of the world were creating larger economies with each passing day, small countries were just bait waiting to be swallowed in a dead end.

You determine your task in the system you are in! All your decisions and the paths you will choose will affect your destiny first, then your nations, and ultimately the destiny of all humanity.

THE APOCALYPTIC PERIOD

A rich and futuristic story...

From different civilizations living outside the "Known World" to secret World organizations, the discovery of secrets hidden between the past and the future, from the existence of humanity to the present, is waiting for you. Being a strong leader on the stage of history heading towards an apocalyptic era will allow you to determine the living conditions of all humanity.

The O.A.C World Begin!

data.short_description: Are you a leader? Once you convince your nation you are their leader, it will be time to show the world your own political, people management and military strategy skills. O.A.C aims to be a breath of fresh air in the grand strategy genre that will inspire its own kind of videogames!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Turkish, Greek
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-6098P CPU 3.60 GHz -or- AMD Athlon II X4 650 @ 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX750 TI with 2GB VRAM -or- ATI Radeon HD 5850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Attention: Not yet tried on weaker machines
